entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: caching #61829
  • Perf improvement: json, kestrel-header-symbols #61828
  • IL-related diagnostic warnings not reported as errors #61827
  • Design proposal: #47685 Add blob() method to JS side of Blazor DotNetStreamReference #61826
  • Enable domain-less sAMAccountName in LdapAdapter #61824
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core.ListenOptions.Protocols is internal in Microsoft.AspNetCore v2.3.0 #61823
  • context.ProtocolMessage.Prompt is not working on Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OpenIdConnect #61820
  • Perf regression: mTls-handshakes-httpsys, updates #61819
  • Stop shipping new versions of the Microsoft.AspnetCore.Authentication.Google package #61817
    .NET 10 Planning

Closed

  • Updating UI in the scaffolded authentication pages is not working #61611
  • [Blazor] AddInteractiveWebAssemblyComponents() should register LazyAssemblyLoader or a similar type. #51966
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #61806

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 8.0.17 #61830
    8.0.x
  • [Blazor] Use `Microsoft.DotNet.HotReload.Agent` package #61821
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Update branding to 9.0.6 #61831
    9.0.5
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #61818
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview5
  • Register LazyAssemblyLoader to DI in AddInteractiveWebAssemblyComponents #61822
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview5
  • Onboard the GitHub Action based Issue-Labeler #61780
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview5

Updated

  • Update helix references #61755
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump dotnet/arcade from 11c848003df85813f4821fec2d43290fd4ca8594 to 43abe63bfc701d34e6599490a557a74710693410 #61771
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/2.3] Update Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel to 8.0.2 #61779
    area-infrastructure
  • Deduplicate group messages across connections #61810
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Prepare for custom cache removal #61666
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 10.0-preview5
  • Blazor - rendering metrics and tracing #61609
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview5
  • Update `ResourceCollectionProvider` to take advantage of Declarative persistent component state #61748
    area-blazor
  • Associate tagged keys with entries so replacements are not evicted #61529
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 10.0-preview5
  • InvalidOperationException when decompressed data exceeds request body size limit #61812
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Swap out Win11 for Win-VS2022 in CI #61743
    area-infrastructure
